page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE IN BANCHORY
page.content: In my family, Mum is usually the boss, for Dad is usually away in Abu Dhabi working in the oil industry. He comes home every month. There are five people in our family. We spend most of our spare time going for walks and watching television. Our house has four bedrooms and three bathrooms, as well as a living room, dining room and kitchen. Mum is kept very busy with the housework and my new baby sister, Lucy. Lucy wakes us all up at 5 a.m. so we don't get much sleep! After school I like to study insects and look after other animals. I often help a friend of mine, Gillian, to look after her horse. We clean out the stables and groom the horse. My other sister gets me into trouble sometimes, but most of the time she is O.K. My dad works in the oil business, and that is why we moved here from Leeds.
